Play with numeric.js:
{"doc":"
cls 
\ Linear algebra example. We start with a matrix.
<js>
var A = [[1,2,3],
         [4,5,6],
         [7,3,9]]; A </jsV> value A

\ Let's also make a vector.
<js> var x = [3,1,2]; x </jsV> value x

\ Matrix-vector product.  b = A (.) x
<js> var b = numeric.dot(vm.g.A,vm.g.x); b </jsV> value b b (see)

\ Matrix inverse.  ~A 
<js> var Ainv = numeric.inv(vm.g.A); Ainv </jsV> value Ainv 
Ainv (see)

\ Let's check it:   ~A (.) b = x Bingo!!!!
<js> numeric.dot(vm.g.Ainv,vm.g.b); </jsV> (see)

\ Determinant
<js> numeric.det(vm.g.A); </jsV> cr tib. 

\ Sin wave
<js> var x = numeric.linspace(0,6.3,25); x </jsV> to x x (see)

<js> var y = numeric.sin(vm.g.x); y </jsV> value y y (see)




stop
js> numeric tib.

stop
js> vm.appname=="jeforth.3hta" [if] char js/numeric-1.2.6.js
[else] char http://www.numericjs.com/lib/numeric-1.2.6.js [then]
readTextFile \ 先讀取 .js 檔, 但不能直接用
<text> 
window.numeric = numeric;  // 先對 source 做一點必要的加工, 把 numeric 掛上 global 
</text> + </js> \ 然後才執行	

stop
\ Also hosted on BootCDN.cn
\ http://cdn.bootcss.com/numeric/1.2.6/numeric.js

\ These lines works fine! Test ok on 3ce, 3hta ADO reads only local files
\ so the path should be only "js/numeric-1.2.6.js",

char     http://localhost:8888/js/numeric-1.2.6.js     readTextFile tib.
char http://www.numericjs.com/lib/numeric-1.2.6.js     readTextFile tib.
char http://www.numericjs.com/lib/numeric-1.2.6.min.js readTextFile tib.
